China trying to 'normalise' military drills near Taiwan, island's top security official saysTaiwan's top security official told parliament on Monday that China runs "joint combat readiness patrols" near the democratic island every 7-10 days on average, saying Chinese forces were trying to "normalise" drills near Taiwan. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 02:48:53 GMT 7Q7GIMPQFJKGJEI7334JB23CKE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-trying-normalise-military-drills-near-taiwan-islands-top-security-official-2024-03-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
Australian writer sentenced to death in China may never be executed, says Chinese ambassadorChina's ambassador to Australia said on Monday that the suspended death sentence given last month to imprisoned Australian writer Yang Hengjun may not be carried out if the former pro-democracy blogger commits no further crimes. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 02:38:12 GMT古兹纳卡利兹拉3ASIO7ZLHMPXA4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australian-writer-sentenced-death-china-may-never-be-executed-says-chinese-2024-03-11/Lewis Jackson世界亚太地区
Oscars 2024: Full list of winners at 96th Academy AwardsThe following is a complete list of Oscar winners at the 96th Academy Awards on Sunday, presented at a live, televised ceremony from Hollywood. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 02:35:10 GMT CVKCCAIBXRJOJLBFENHULRRX54 https://www.reuters.com/lifestyle/full-list-oscar-winners-96th-academy-awards-2024-03-11/Reuters生活方式

Cillian Murphy wins best actor Oscar for 'Oppenheimer'LOS ANGELES, March 10 (Reuters) - Cillian Murphy earned his first Academy Award for his portrayal in “Oppenheimer” of the physicist who led the United States’ development of the atomic bomb during World War Two. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 02:01:20 GMT Y3X47RE6XNICNAOJNKBWVJDRO4 https://www.reuters.com/lifestyle/cillian-murphy-wins-best-actor-oscar-oppenheimer-2024-03-11/Reuters生活方式
Russian embassy in US in contact with State Department ahead of elections, ambassador saysThe Russian embassy in Washington is in "close contact" with the U.S. State Department ahead of the presidential election in Russia this week to ensure the security of the diplomatic mission, ambassador Anatoly Antonov said on Monday. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 01:05:52 GMT卡蒂祖伊D5LBPMTAMQ2LRNQKGQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-embassy-us-contact-with-state-department-ahead-elections-ambassador-says-2024-03-11/Reuters世界欧洲

China ambassador says Australia wine tariff review on trackChina's review of tariffs on Australian wine is progressing well, Chinese Ambassador Xiao Qian said on Monday, but he stopped short of confirming an Australian government claim the dispute would be resolved this month. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 00:32:20 GMT YRI5HZHGAVNUXKXSCOQAIFSKQ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinese-ambassador-says-review-into-tariffs-australian-wine-progressing-well-2024-03-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
In Bolivia, heavy rains prompt authorities to declare state of emergencyHeavy rain in Bolivia's capital, La Paz, prompted authorities to declare a state of emergency, a government document showed on Sunday, after overflowing rivers destroyed many houses over the weekend. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 23:31:36 GMT MAPIGSGZNRMYDGODLDR73DOIBE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/bolivia-heavy-rains-prompt-authorities-declare-state-emergency-2024-03-10/Reuters商业环境
Panama upholds ex-President Martinelli's ban from 2024 electionPanama's electoral court announced on Sunday it had upheld its decision to ban ex-President Ricardo Martinelli from running in the 2024 general election, following the review of a challenge presented by Martinelli's defense to annul the prohibition. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 22:04:38 GMT MRB7YZSGINPTTC7UO6GUNEVVB4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/panama-upholds-ex-president-martinellis-ban-2024-election-2024-03-10/Reuters世界美洲
